document.heading: Child and Youth, Safety and Health Omnibus Temporary Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-164, the “Child and Youth, Safety and Health Omnibus Temporary Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-577, which was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 5, 2002, and April 9, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 24, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-332 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-164 became effective on June 25, 2002.
